item.title: Film
item.description: 2023 .container { display: flex; align-items: flex-end; } .text { margin-left: 20px; } h1 { font-size: 18px; margin: 0; } h2 { font-size: 18px; margin-bottom: 5px; } h3 { font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 5px; } img { max-width: 20%; height: auto; margin-bottom: 30px; } a { text-decoration: none; } :root { --filtered-color: rgb(110, 20, 30); } .image-container { flex-wrap: wrap; } .image-container img { max-height: 20px; width: auto; object-fit: cover; flex: 1; } 脐带 (2022) The Cord of Life @流程研发 Pipeline TD / Digital Intermediate Engineer .

item.title: Reel
item.description: .aspect-ratio { position: relative; width: 100%; height: 0; padding-bottom: 75%; } .aspect-ratio iframe { position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0; top: 0; } DI TD&FX 2023 SHOWREEL .aspect-ratio { position: relative; width: 100%; height: 0; padding-bottom: 75%; } .aspect-ratio iframe { position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0; top: 0; } DI Colorist Reel 2020 - TRUTHLESS .
